tool_description: Optimizes maintenance schedules to minimize costs, maximize fleet availability, and balance resource utilization using advanced algorithms.

optimization_objective.description: Primary optimization goal: cost_minimization, availability_maximization, resource_balancing, or balanced

allow_schedule_shifts.description: Whether optimizer can shift maintenance timing within safety limits

error_messages: Schedule not found: The provided schedule_id does not exist.
Invalid optimization objective: Use one of [cost_minimization, availability_maximization, resource_balancing, balanced].
Invalid weight configuration: All weights (cost_weight, availability_weight, resource_weight) must sum to 1.0.
Invalid availability target: fleet_availability_target must be between 70 and 100.
Optimization failed: Unable to find feasible solution within iteration limit.
usage: Provide schedule_id and optionally customize optimization parameters and objectives. Returns an optimized schedule with performance improvements.

optimized_schedule_id.description: ID of the newly optimized schedule

optimization_summary.description: Summary of optimization changes and improvements made
